Script for Narrator

Dialog 2 – dSecond

Player: Can I have a piece of paper?
Susan: Sure, I have plenty.
[NARR] Narrator: You get a piece of paper.

Dialog 3 – dTeen1

Player: What's your name?
[NARR] Narrator: <blows smoke in your face>

Dialog 10 – dCashier_sign2

Player: Sunday matinee
Debra: The special Sunday matinee showing of Troll 3.
Cashier: Great! I've heard it's exceptionally bad.
Cashier: Here's your ticket. Have fun!
[NARR] Narrator: **** 90 MINUTES LATER ****

Dialog 11 – dParents

Player: I'm adopted.
Mom: What?
Dad: Are you feeling okay?
Debra: It's true. I'm not related to you at all.
Mom: That's just ridiculous.
Debra: So there. Now you know.
[NARR] Narrator: <Hang up>

Player: Why can't you be like the Weasleys.
Dad: Who?
Debra: The Weasleys, Dad! They know magic and everything.
Mom: I think she's referring to Harry Potter.
Dad: Well, that's just crazy.
Debra: Sorry you're just not as cool.
[NARR] Narrator: <Hang up>

Player: I stepped on a crack.
Debra: Twice.
Dad: Uh huh.
Debra: With no thought of your back Mom.
Mom: Well, I feel fine.
Debra: Do you though?
Mom: Yeah. Are you feeling okay honey?
Debra: I'll probably do it again too.
[NARR] Narrator: <Hang up>

Room 1 – church lobby

Debra: I keep dreaming of Timothy.
Debra: Ever since his passing, he won't leave my dreams.
Debra: Something is wrong.
Debra: His soul is lost. And I pray, but get no answers.
Debra: I need to get God's attention.
Debra: But how?
Debra: Maybe this week's Bible study guide will inspire me.
[NARR] Narrator: TO PLAY: Left-click to Interact. Right-click to Look

Room 4 – radio front

Mom: Police Tip line. Do you have a tip?
Debra: I do. I know who commited the murder.
Mom: Really? Okay, do you have a name?
Debra: Skip Gote
Mom: Okay. We'll send officers to investigate.
[NARR] Narrator: <Hung up>
Debra: I need to make sure the police find evidence of Skip being there.
Debra: I already called them.
Debra: I have no reason to do that.

Room 7 – mercury motors

Mercury: ITS IS I, MERCURY, GOD OF COMMERCE,TRICKERY, bla bla whatever!
Mercury: Wait, just one of you?
Mercury: It's been a long time since I've had a worshipper.
Mercury: Here. Take this.
Mercury: Have a nice day!
[NARR] Narrator: Nothing happens.
Debra: I've talked to Mercury enough today.

Room 8 – downtown

Mom: Police Tip line. Do you have a tip?
Debra: I do. I know who commited the murder.
Mom: Really? Okay, do you have a name?
Debra: Skip Gote
Mom: Okay. We'll send officers to investigate.
[NARR] Narrator: <Hung up>
Debra: I need to make sure the police find evidence of Skip being there.
Debra: I already called them.
